languages.text: Эфир полнится напряженной тишиной, лишь изредка нарушаемой тяжелым дыханием Мастера вокса вражеского судна. Ваши слова прозвучали убедительно — забыв о мести, пираты бегут с поля боя, поджав хвосты.

traits.locale_text: Эфир полнится напряженной тишиной, лишь изредка нарушаемой тяжелым дыханием вокс-мастера вражеского сунда. Ваши слова прозвучали убедительно — забыв о мести, пираты бегут с поля боя, поджав хвосты.

languages.text: The tense radio silence is occasionally punctuated with the heavy breaths of the enemy ship's Vox Master. Your words have convinced them: the pirates forget all about revenge and flee the battlefield with their tails between their legs.
languages.original_text: Эфир полнится напряженной тишиной, лишь изредка нарушаемой тяжелым дыханием Мастера вокса вражеского судна. Ваши слова прозвучали убедительно — забыв о мести, пираты бегут с поля боя, поджав хвосты.

traits.locale_text: The tense radio silence is occasionally punctuated by the heavy breath of the enemy ship's Vox Master. Your words have sounded convincing: the pirates forget all about revenge and flee from the battlefield with their tails between their legs.

The tense radio silence is occasionally punctuated by the heavy breath of the enemy ship's Vox Master. Your words have sounded convincing: the pirates forget all about revenge and flee from the battlefield with their tails between their legs.

The tense radio silence is occasionally punctuated with the heavy breaths of the enemy ship's Vox Master. Your words have sounded convincing: the pirates forget all about revenge and flee from the battlefield with their tails between their legs.

The tense radio silence is occasionally punctuated with the heavy breaths of the enemy ship's Vox Master. Your words have convinced them: the pirates forget all about revenge and flee the battlefield with their tails between their legs.

The tense radio silence is occasionally punctuated with the heavy breaths of the enemy ship's Vox Master. Your words have convinced them: the pirates forget all about revenge and flee the battlefield with their tails between their legs.

The tense radio silence is occasionally punctuated with the heavy breaths of the enemy ship's Vox Master. Your words have convinced them: the pirates forget all about revenge and flee the battlefield with their tails between their legs.

languages.text: 无线电没有发出任何声音，偶尔传来敌方音阵大师沉重的呼吸声。你的话说服了那些海盗，他们打消了一切复仇的念头，夹着尾巴逃离了战场。
languages.original_text: The tense radio silence is occasionally punctuated with the heavy breaths of the enemy ship's Vox Master. Your words have convinced them: the pirates forget all about revenge and flee the battlefield with their tails between their legs.

traits.locale_text: 无线电没有发出任何声音，偶尔传来敌方音阵大师沉重的呼吸声。你的话说服了那些海盗，他们打消了一切复仇的念头，夹着尾巴逃离了战场。

languages.text: El tenso silencio de radio solo se interrumpe ocasionalmente por la pesada respiración del maestro de vocos de la nave enemiga. Tus palabras les han convencido: los piratas olvidarán la venganza y huirán del campo de batalla con el rabo entre las piernas.
languages.original_text: The tense radio silence is occasionally punctuated with the heavy breaths of the enemy ship's Vox Master. Your words have convinced them: the pirates forget all about revenge and flee the battlefield with their tails between their legs.

traits.locale_text: El tenso silencio de radio solo se interrumpe ocasionalmente por la pesada respiración del maestro de vocos de la nave enemiga. Tus palabras les han convencido: los piratas olvidarán la venganza y huirán del campo de batalla con el rabo entre las piernas.

languages.text: 緊迫した無線の沈黙が、時折、敵艦のマスター・ヴォクスの重い息遣いで破られる。伝えた言葉に納得したのか、海賊たちは復讐することを忘れ、尻尾を巻いて戦場から逃走する。
languages.original_text: The tense radio silence is occasionally punctuated with the heavy breaths of the enemy ship's Vox Master. Your words have convinced them: the pirates forget all about revenge and flee the battlefield with their tails between their legs.

traits.locale_text: 緊迫した無線の沈黙が、時折、敵艦のマスター・ヴォクスの重い息遣いで破られる。伝えた言葉に納得したのか、海賊たちは復讐することを忘れ、尻尾を巻いて戦場から逃走する。

languages.text: Die angespannte Funkstille wird nur gelegentlich durch das schwere Atem des Voxmeisters des feindlichen Schiffs unterbrochen. Deine Worte haben sie überzeugt: Die Piraten vergessen jeden Rachegedanken und fliegen mit eingekniffenem Schwanz vom Schlachtfeld.
languages.original_text: The tense radio silence is occasionally punctuated with the heavy breaths of the enemy ship's Vox Master. Your words have convinced them: the pirates forget all about revenge and flee the battlefield with their tails between their legs.

traits.locale_text: Die angespannte Funkstille wird nur gelegentlich durch das schwere Atem des Voxmeisters des feindlichen Schiffs unterbrochen. Deine Worte haben sie überzeugt: Die Piraten vergessen jeden Rachegedanken und fliegen mit eingekniffenem Schwanz vom Schlachtfeld.

languages.text: Le silence radio tendu est parfois ponctué des profondes respirations du maître du vox du vaisseau ennemi. Vos mots les ont convaincus : les piratent oublient leurs histoires de vengeance et fuient le champ de bataille, la queue entre les jambes.
languages.original_text: The tense radio silence is occasionally punctuated with the heavy breaths of the enemy ship's Vox Master. Your words have convinced them: the pirates forget all about revenge and flee the battlefield with their tails between their legs.

traits.locale_text: Le silence radio tendu est parfois ponctué des profondes respirations du maître du vox du vaisseau ennemi. Vos mots les ont convaincus : les piratent oublient leurs histoires de vengeance et fuient le champ de bataille, la queue entre les jambes.

languages.text: Gergin sessizlik, ara sıra düşman gemisindeki Voks Üstadı'nın ağır nefesleriyle kesiliyor. Sözlerine ikna oluyorlar: Korsanlar, intikamı unutup kuyruklarını kıstırarak savaş alanından kaçıyor.
languages.original_text: The tense radio silence is occasionally punctuated with the heavy breaths of the enemy ship's Vox Master. Your words have convinced them: the pirates forget all about revenge and flee the battlefield with their tails between their legs.
